TriggerOraclev10g.name: ACCOUNT_TYPE_RIDER_TRIGGER
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE account_type account.type%type; BEGIN SELECT type into account_type from account where ID = :NEW.id; IF 'rider' != account_type THEN raise_application_error(-20001, 'Account type for id ' || TO_CHAR(:NEW.id) || 'must be rider'); end if; end;
